meanings.definition: The state or quality of being alike; similarity.
meanings.sent1: The likenesses between the twins were striking.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting captured the likenesses of the two friends perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The likenesses in the mirror made the twins giggle.
meanings.sent4: The likenesses of the two mountains were so similar, it was as if they were twins.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun game to explain the concept of likenesses to the students.

meanings.definition: A picture, portrait, or statue of a person that is similar to the actual person.
meanings.sent1: The family proudly displayed the likenesses of their ancestors on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor created a lifelike likeness of the famous actor.
meanings.sent3: The likenesses in the museum seemed to come alive at night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the painting was a perfect likeness of her joyous spirit.
meanings.sent5: The artist's skillful use of colors brought out the likenesses in the portrait.
